original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between the business and technical domains, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. Your primary focus will be on developing new processes and implementing technical solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive innovative solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows)
- Translate business requirements into robust technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing querying, reporting, and data visualization tools as needed
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency through configuration changes and the implementation of best practices
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and address complex issues
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in utilizing data analysis tools and techniques to uncover insights and drive process improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Familiarity with SQL and database management concepts

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successful machine learning (ML) implementation and deployment
- Experience in the vehicle configuration space, demonstrating a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems and processes

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role will be part of a dynamic, cross-functional team that values collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement. You will be expected to work closely with business stakeholders to understand their needs, translate them into technical solutions, and ensure seamless implementation and ongoing support. A proactive, adaptable, and solutions-oriented mindset is crucial for success in this role.

Role Overview:
This is a unique opportunity to leverage your technical expertise and business acumen to drive significant impact within our organization. As a key member of the team, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between business requirements and technical solutions, ensuring our vehicle configuration systems accurately reflect the needs of the business and operate at peak efficiency. By combining your analytical skills, process improvement mindset, and technical proficiency, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with cross-functional stakeholders to deeply understand their business needs, challenges, and objectives, and translate these into comprehensive system requirements and configurations
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations within our [mention specific system] backend, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and processes
- Implement and test new configurations, collaborating with developers and IT support to ensure successful deployment and ongoing maintenance
- Analyze existing data, processes, and system performance to identify opportunities for improvement, utilizing data analysis tools and techniques to uncover insights and drive data-driven decision-making
- Spearhead the implementation of innovative solutions, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to streamline and optimize vehicle configuration processes
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that configurations meet business requirements and function as expected
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Foster strong relationships with cross-functional teams, including developers, IT support, and other stakeholders, to ensure seamless collaboration and the successful deployment of technical solutions

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and develop effective, data-driven solutions
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in utilizing data analysis tools and techniques, including querying, reporting, and data visualization

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language
- Familiarity with SQL and database management concepts

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successful machine learning (ML) implementation and deployment, demonstrating your ability to leverage these technologies to drive business impact
- Extensive experience in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements

Preferred Experience:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems and processes, with a track record of identifying and implementing process improvements

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role requires a dynamic and collaborative approach, as you will be working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions. You will be expected to proactively identify opportunities for improvement, champion process changes, and effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. A strong problem-solving mindset, adaptability, and a commitment to continuous learning are essential for success in this role.

Role Overview:
Become a key player in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration capabilities by joining our team as a technical configuration specialist. In this role, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between business requirements and technical solutions, ensuring our systems accurately reflect the evolving needs of the organization and operate at peak efficiency. By leveraging your exceptional analytical skills, process improvement mindset, and proficiency in cutting-edge technologies, you will drive innovative solutions that unlock new levels of performance and customer satisfaction.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with business stakeholders across various departments to deeply understand their needs, challenges, and objectives, and translate these into comprehensive system requirements and configurations
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations within our [mention specific system] backend, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems and processes
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, working closely with developers and IT support to ensure successful deployment and ongoing maintenance
- Analyze existing data, processes, and system performance to identify opportunities for improvement, utilizing advanced data analysis tools and techniques to uncover insights and drive data-driven decision-making
- Spearhead the implementation of innovative solutions, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to streamline and optimize vehicle configuration processes, driving measurable business impact
- Actively participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that configurations meet business requirements and function as expected
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Foster strong relationships with cross-functional teams, including developers, IT support, and other stakeholders, to ensure seamless collaboration and the successful deployment of technical solutions

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems, leverage data insights, and develop innovative, data-driven solutions
- Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, enabling you to effectively translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in utilizing advanced data analysis tools and techniques, including querying, reporting, and data visualization, to uncover insights and drive process improvements

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming language and familiarity with SQL and database management concepts
- Demonstrated expertise in the application of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to drive business impact

Required Experience:
- Proven track record of successful machine learning (ML) implementation and deployment, showcasing your ability to leverage these cutting-edge technologies to deliver tangible business benefits
- Extensive experience in the vehicle configuration space, with a deep understanding of the associated business processes and technical requirements, and a demonstrated ability to identify and implement process improvements

Preferred Experience:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment, with a track record of successful project delivery
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems and processes, demonstrating a strong commitment to continuous improvement and innovation

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- Advanced data analysis and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)

Work Environment & Expectations:
This role requires a dynamic, forward-thinking, and collaborative approach, as you will be working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver transformative solutions. You will be expected to proactively identify opportunities for improvement, champion process changes, and effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. A strong problem-solving mindset, adaptability, and a passion for continuous learning and innovation are essential for success in this role.
